# How to 
1 create 2 repo
  *username/source
  *username/username.github.io
2 clone repo on computer and remove readme files
  
2 start new R project
3 project option -> website, select source as base directory
4 load necessary libraries 

```{r librairies, message=F, eval=FALSE}
# Load blogdown package and install Hugo
library(blogdown)
install_hugo()
```

5 choose a theme
6 set "source" as working directory
7 create site
```{r}
# Create new site in our recently cloned blogdown repository
new_site(theme = "kakawait/hugo-tranquilpeak-theme",
         format = 'toml')
```

8 add folowing lines in  config.toml and update the url
```{r}
publishDir = "X:/.../username.github.io"
themesdir = "X:/.../source/themes"
baseURL = "https://username.github.io/"

```

9 build the site
```{r}
build_site()
```


10 in Terminal, type 
```{r }
cd X:/.../username.github.io

git add *

git commit -m "update ID"

git push origin master
```

11 go to https://username.github.io/ in browser
